interface.name: org.altlinux.alterator.edition1
interface.doc:summary: Exposes edition-specific backend methods that return metadata and texts for a selected product edition.
Предоставляет методы бэкенда для выбранной редакции продукта; возвращает метаданные и тексты.

method.name: Info
method.doc:summary: Return the .edition descriptor for the requested edition.

arg.name: stdout_bytes
arg.doc:detail: TOML text with fields like name, display_name, license.
TOML-текст с полями name, display_name, license.

arg.name: response
arg.doc:detail: 0 — success, != 0 — error.
0 — успех, != 0 — ошибка.

method.name: Description
method.doc:summary: Return the description text for the edition.

arg.name: stdout_bytes
arg.doc:detail: Lookup order: description.<locale>.html, description.<lang>.html, description.all.html, description.html in the edition directory.
Порядок поиска: description.<locale>.html, description.<lang>.html, description.all.html, description.html в каталоге редакции.

arg.name: response
arg.doc:detail: 0 — success, != 0 — error.
0 — успех, != 0 — ошибка.

method.name: License
method.doc:summary: Return the license text for the edition.

arg.name: stdout_bytes
arg.doc:detail: Lookup in /usr/share/distro-licenses/<license> using license.<locale>.html, license.<lang>.html, license.all.html, license.html.
Поиск в `/usr/share/distro-licenses/<license>`: license.<locale>.html, license.<lang>.html, license.all.html, license.html.

arg.name: response
arg.doc:detail: 0 — success, != 0 — error.
0 — успех, != 0 — ошибка.

method.name: ReleaseNotes
method.doc:summary: Return release notes for the edition.

arg.name: stdout_bytes
arg.doc:detail: Lookup order: release-notes.<locale>.html, release-notes.<lang>.html, release-notes.all.html, release-notes.html in the edition directory.
Порядок поиска: release-notes.<locale>.html, release-notes.<lang>.html, release-notes.all.html, release-notes.html в каталоге редакции.

arg.name: response
arg.doc:detail: 0 — success, != 0 — error.
0 — успех, != 0 — ошибка.

method.name: FinalNotes
method.doc:summary: Return final notes for the edition.

arg.name: stdout_bytes
arg.doc:detail: Lookup order: final-notes.<locale>.html, final-notes.<lang>.html, final-notes.all.html, final-notes.html in the edition directory.
Порядок поиска: final-notes.<locale>.html, final-notes.<lang>.html, final-notes.all.html, final-notes.html в каталоге редакции.

arg.name: response
arg.doc:detail: 0 — success, != 0 — error.
0 — успех, != 0 — ошибка.
